tool_description: Calculates positions of additional astrological points including lunar nodes, Arabic parts, midpoints, and sensitive points for comprehensive chart analysis.

birth_datetime.description: Birth date and time in UTC

planetary_positions.description: Array of planetary positions for midpoint calculations

include_fixed_stars.description: Include positions of major fixed stars

midpoint_orb.description: Orb tolerance for midpoint aspects in degrees (0.5-3)

node_calculation_method.description: Lunar node calculation: true_node or mean_node

error_messages: Invalid position values: All position values must be between 0 and 359.99 degrees.
Insufficient planetary data: At least 5 planetary positions required for comprehensive calculations.
Invalid midpoint orb: midpoint_orb must be between 0.5 and 3 degrees.
Invalid node method: Use either 'true_node' or 'mean_node' for node_calculation_method.
Calculation precision error: Unable to calculate precise positions for some chart points.
usage: Provide sun_position, moon_position, ascendant_position, birth_datetime, and planetary_positions array. Optionally enable Arabic parts, midpoints, and fixed stars. Returns additional chart point positions.

north_node.description: North Lunar Node position in degrees

south_node.description: South Lunar Node position in degrees

part_of_fortune.description: Part of Fortune position in degrees

arabic_parts.description: Additional Arabic Parts positions if requested

fixed_star_conjunctions.description: Fixed stars conjunct chart points within orb
